Package org.jtrim2.swing.component

Interface TransformationStepDef

public interface TransformationStepDef
Defines a single transformation step of TransformedImageDisplay. Instances of this interface are meant to be a logical definition of a transformation step. The actual transformation is applied by the ImageTransformationStep set for the TransformationStepDef.

You may define additional transformations to be applied before or after this transformation by calling getPosition().addBefore() or getPosition().addAfter(). Also, you may permanently remove this transformation step by calling removeStep().

Since TransformationStepDef instances are associated with a TransformedImageDisplay, its method may only be called from the the AWT Event Dispatch Thread.

See Also:
  • TransformedImageDisplay

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    TransformationStepPos
    getPosition()
    Returns a TransformationStepPos which might be used to add a transformation to be applied before or after this transformation.
    void
    removeStep()
    Removes this transformation step permanently.
    void
    setTransformation(ImageTransformationStep transformation)
    Replaces the transformation to be actually applied by this transformation step.

  • Method Details

    • getPosition

      TransformationStepPos getPosition()
      Returns a TransformationStepPos which might be used to add a transformation to be applied before or after this transformation. Note that it is not possible to add transformations through the returned reference after this TransformationStepDef has been removed.
      Returns:
      a TransformationStepPos which might be used to add a transformation to be applied before or after this transformation. This method never returns null.

    • setTransformation

      void setTransformation(ImageTransformationStep transformation)
      Replaces the transformation to be actually applied by this transformation step. Setting null will effectively cause this transformation to be skipped by the renderer of TransformedImageDisplay.
      Parameters:
      transformation - the transformation to be actually applied by this transformation step. This argument can be null if this step should apply an identity transformation.
      See Also:
      • TransformationSteps.cachedStep

    • removeStep

      void removeStep()
      Removes this transformation step permanently. After this TransformationStepDef has been removed, it will no longer apply its transformation set by the setTransformation method.

      Note: Attempting to add a transformation before or after this TransformationStepDef will fail after removeStep() has been called.
